extensionAttribute.description: Displays the device's GroupUID, useful in query's the Watchman Monitoring API.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/bash
if [[ -f /Library/MonitoringClient/Utilities/ExportStatus ]]; then echo "<result>$(defaults read /Library/MonitoringClient/ClientData/UnifiedStatus.plist GroupUID)</result>" else echo "<result>Watchman Monitoring not installed</result>" fi
